subject: Data
title: Data Art: When Visualization Becomes Beautiful
description: A quick win: understand Data Art: When Visualization Becomes Beautiful.

hook.text: Stefanie Posavec hand-drew every sentence of 'On the Road' as colored paths. Data became art.

buildup.text: Data art prioritizes beauty and emotion alongside accuracy ‚Äî turning numbers into aesthetic experiences.

discovery.text: Jer Thorp, Giorgia Lupi, and Nadieh Bremer push boundaries between data analysis and visual art.

twist.text: Purists argue data art sacrifices clarity. Artists argue emotional engagement makes data more memorable.

climax.text: The Museum of Modern Art now collects data visualizations as artworks.

punchline.text: Data became something you hang on a wall.

quiz.question: What distinguishes data art from standard data visualization?
options: It prioritizes beauty and emotion alongside accuracy
